component.text: Roll over the highlighted areas for more information.
This segment contains the management hosts themselves and the Cisco IOS routers that act as terminal servers.
This segment connects to all of the devices that require management.
Cisco IOS router that acts as a firewall and a virtual private network (VPN) termination device separating the two network segments.
Configuration and Management traffic sent to/from devices via the console port is OOB Configuration Management.
Configuration and Management traffic sent to/from devices via an Ethernet connection is in-band configuration Management. Stateful Packet Filtering and encryption is required.
